item.title: CVE-2022-4258|2024-08-03T01:34:49.949Z -- hima -- hopcs
item.description: In multiple versions of HIMA PC based Software an unquoted Windows search path vulnerabilityÂ might allow local users to gain privileges via a malicious .exe file and gain full access to the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-24781|2024-02-13T13:48:23.959Z -- hima -- f30%2003x%20yy%20%28com%29
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use an uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability to DoS the affected devices through excessive traffic on a single ethernet port.

item.title: CVE-2024-24782|2024-02-13T13:47:58.187Z -- hima -- f30%2003x%20yy%20%28com%29
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker can send a ping request from one network to another through an error in the origin verification even though the ports are separated by VLAN.
